scripts.render: remotion render DoceShowcaseDark out/doce-showcase.mp4 && remotion render DoceShowcaseLight out/doce-showcase-light.mp4
scripts.render:gif: remotion render DoceShowcaseDark out/doce-showcase.gif --image-format=png --scale=0.5 --every-nth-frame=2 && remotion render DoceShowcaseLight out/doce-showcase-light.gif --image-format=png --scale=0.5 --every-nth-frame=2
